frown.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to make an angry, unhappy, or confused expression, moving your eyebrows together
frown.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: She frowned as she read the letter.
frown.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: the expression on your face when you move your eyebrows together because you are angry, unhappy, or confused
frown.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He looked at her with a puzzled frown.
